title: 94/559/EC: Commission Decision of 26 July 1994 updating of the list of entities covered by Council Directive 90/547/EEC on the transit of electricity transmission grids
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 July 1994 updating of the list of entities covered by Council Directive 90/547/EEC on the transit of electricity transmission grids (94/559/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Annex to Directive 90/547/EEC on the transit of electricity through transmission grids, reads as follows for Germany:
